page.title: 20Bus Service At Notgrove
page.content:
Living in Notgrove is quiet, with life revolving mainly round the seasonal work of the farm. It is a close knit community with plenty of local activities taking place in the village hall and the church. Shopping is done mainly in Cheltenham or Cirencester. Twice a week, on Thursday morning and Saturday afternoon a Pulhams coach takes people from the village into Cheltenham. At other times people have to walk up to the main A436 road to catch the bus.
This block has been written by Shipton Oliff W.I. who gratefully acknowledges the co-operation of the Villagers of Notgrove and Westfield. Thanks also to Rob on the computer, and Fred for taking the photographs.
